Zen Educate | Full stack engineer (React and Ruby) | London | Ideally onsite, but will consider remote | Full-time

UK schools spend over £2bn per year covering short-term absences with supply teachers. The current model is exclusively reliant on agencies that charge a massive commission and are terribly inefficient — everything is paper and phone-call based. We’re using technology to change this by building a marketplace to connect schools directly with teachers, pulling hundreds of millions of waste out of the education system.

We are well-funded by high-profile investors, have had significant early traction, and are led by start-up veterans behind two of London’s most prominent tech companies. As an early employee, you’ll play a significant role in the development of the company and have the opportunity for rapid career progression and learning.

We’re looking for a full stack engineer happy to work with React, Ruby and React native and who likes coming in each day working with a small, committed team on a mission for good.

We can sponsor visas if you’re interested in taking a move to London.

More about Zen and the role below: https://www.zeneducate.com https://angel.co/zen-educate https://www.zeneducate.com/careers#full-stack-software-engin...

To apply, please email jono@zeneducate.com
